translation: Some yogis perform sacrifice to the gods alone; while others, who have realized the Self, offer the Self as sacrifice in the fire of Brahman alone.
commentary: 4.25 Daivam pertaining to Devas? Eve only? Others some? Yajnam sacrifice? Yogis: Yogis? worship perform? Brahmagnau in the fire of Brahman? Other others? Yajnam sacrifice? by sacrifice by sacrifice? Eve verily? Upajuhvati offer as sacrifice.Commentary Some Yogis who are devoted to Karma Yoga perform sacrificial rites to the shining ones or Devas (gods). The second Yajna is JnanaYajna or the sacrifice of wisdom
